titleStmt.title: D.E. defeated, or, A reply to a late scurrilous pamphlet vented against the Lord Bishop of Worcester's letter, whereby he vindicated himself from Mr. Baxter's misreports. / By S.H.
titleStmt.author: Holden, Samuel, fl. 1662-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Item at 603:12 is incorrectly identified as Wing H2381 in reel guide.
Reproduction of originals in University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library and Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
An answer to Edward Bagshaw's Letter to a person of honour which is a reply to George Morley's Letter to a friend.
